contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|scoop}} '''Scoop''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} == Related to journalism == * [[Scoop (term)]], a news story, particularly connotating a new or developing story with aspects of importance and excitement, normally an exclusive for the journalist involved * [[Scoop (novel)|''Scoop'' (novel)]], a 1938 satirical novel by Evelyn Waugh set in the world of foreign correspondence ** [[Scoop (1987 film)|''Scoop'' (1987 TV film)]] based on the novel * [[Scoop (2006 film)|''Scoop'' (2006 film)]], a film written and directed by Woody Allen * [[Scoop (news website)]], a news website based in New Zealand * Todd “Scoops” Ming, a character on ''[[WordGirl]]'' * [[Scoop (journalism magazine)|''Scoop'' (journalism magazine)]], a quarterly publication by the Australian Journalists Association * [[Scoop (TV series)|''Scoop'' (TV series)]], a children's series on CBBC featuring Shaun Williamson and Hacker T Dog == Related to the shape == * [[Scoop (tool)]], a shovel-like tool, particularly one deep and curved, used in digging * [[Scoop (machine part)]], a component of machinery to carry things * [[Scoop stretcher]], (or clamshell, Robertson Orthopedic Stretcher), a device used specifically for casualty lifting * [[Scoop (utensil)]], a specialized spoon for serving * [[Hood scoop]], a ventilating opening in the bonnet (hood) of a car == Culture == * [[Scoop (Transformers)]], a fictional alien robot * [[Scoop (G.I. Joe)]], a fictional character in the G.I. Joe universe * [[Scoop (album)|''Scoop'' (album)]], a 1983 collection of out-takes and demo versions by Pete Townshend; also similar projects * ''[[Another Scoop]]'', ''[[Scoop 3]]'', and a CD compendium ''[[Scooped]]'' * [[Scoop (theater)]], a type of wide area lighting fixture * Scoop, a Malaysian film by [[Aziz M. Osman]] * [[Scoop (dance project)]], a Belgian dance project by Jan Vervloet * Scoop, the yellow digger [[List of Bob the Builder characters|character on ''Bob the Builder'']] == People == * [[Henry M. Jackson]] (1912–1983), also known as "Scoop" Jackson, a mid-20th-century American senator * [[Fatman Scoop]], an American rapper * [[Antonio Jardine|Scoop Jardine]] (born 1988), American basketball player * [[Scoops Carry]] (1915–1970), an American jazz alto saxophonist and clarinetist == Software == * [[Python SCOOP (software)]], a Python framework for scalable concurrent operations * [[SCOOP (software)]], the Simple Concurrent Object-Oriented Programming extension for concurrent programming in the Eiffel programming language == Other == * [[Scoop (cricket)]], a modern shot in cricket which involves reversing the grip on the bat * [[Spring Championship of Online Poker]], a series of online poker tournaments * [[Goldfish scooping]], a traditional Japanese game {{disambiguation}}
